value.title: Create an excel based budget app with PowerApps and use it in Power BI
value.excerpt: In today's video I will walk though how to create your first powerapp using excel and onedrive as a source.  The app will be a budget file app that we will them import into Power BI for further analysis, both the data and the app√∂  The possibilities are endeless!! Enjoy!    Looking for a download file?

value.title: DAX Fridays! #11: Using variables in DAX
value.excerpt: Variables are an extremely useful feature in DAX, but perhaps not a well known one. Variables, 1. Make your formulas more readable 2. You can reuse them through your report 3. Can also be tables 4. Are more efficient  Download our Growth dashboard if you want to see the example live:http://curbal.com/blog/the-ultimate-dashboard-to-track-your-website-growth-with-google-analytics-and-power-bi-supercharged-excel

value.title: DAX Fridays! #14: SUMMARIZE
value.excerpt: Learn how to use the function SUMMARIZE in DAX/ Powerpivot.  The function SUMMARIZE can return a summary of sales grouped around the calendar year and the product category name, this result table allows you to do analysis over the reseller sales by year and product category.
